Articles.Content:
Well, post your KSP demotivaters here!

incase you didnt get it, the trajectory showed for it to land on land, (thats why it had landing legs) but then, by the time i got there, it was water.

RULES:

To make one, simply use somthing like paint.net to modify a photo to say somthing, like i just did.

lol mechjeb, that thing is a demotivator itself... cant seem to work it out properly ???

i think the worst tho is doing a landing on the mun/minmus and not quite slowing down enough for when you touch down, BOOM!!!!
Then you don\'t have enough thrust or fuel... Mechjeb is extremely easy to use.

Does the username

'theshhh'

ring a bell to you by the way?

Does the username

'theshhh'

ring a bell to you by the way?

yes, why?

lol mechjeb, that thing is a demotivator itself... cant seem to work it out properly ???

i think the worst tho is doing a landing on the mun/minmus and not quite slowing down enough for when you touch down, BOOM!!!!

Then you don\'t have enough thrust or fuel... Mechjeb is extremely easy to use.

yes, it is very easy to use. why its the easiest thing ive ever seen!

ALSO: Opps, forgot to say that a demotivator is a PICTURE not a sentence.
